title: Dubwise
description: Dubwise is an AI-powered video translation platform that lets creators go global while keeping their authentic voice. Transform your content into 16 languages with perfect pronunciation, starting at just $1/minute (50% cheaper than competitors). Whether you're dubbing solo videos or multi-speaker podcasts, our technology preserves each speaker's unique voice traits while nailing the target language. Get your videos translated in minutes, not weeks — faster than your pizza delivery!
